mapper.insert: insert into Banner (brandId, managerName, managerTel, startDate, endDate, bannerName, bannerMessage, status, categoryId) values(#{brandId}, #{managerName}, #{managerTel}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{bannerName}, #{bannerMessage}, 'PENDING', #{categoryId} )
mapper.update: update Banner (managerName, managerTel, updatedAt, endDate, bannerName, bannerMessage, status, categoryId) values(#{managerName}, #{managerTel}, #{updatedAt}, #{endDate}, #{bannerName}, #{bannerMessage}, 'PENDING', #{categoryId} )
